channel.title: Moley's 'Convert the Neut's' Idea
channel.description:
So... I've been thinking. With the recent changes, it is perfectly possible to end up with 4 unconvertible neutrals, on top of a 2 non-convertible BD, on top of 4 people protected by Court wizards. I feel the following changes would help the game - and might increase these classes winrates
**Alchemist** - Make it convertible. (It becomes a RITUALIST for Cult and a HERBALIST for unseen) - Maybe make Stoneskin Potion make it night and convert immune.
**Scorned**
- Have it convert to apostle for cult, and a new class for unseen (Like...maybe Counterfeiter?) - Counterfeiter would have the be able to chose a player to frame each night from every player (except king). This ability would have infinite uses - They would keep the Troll box ability. They would lose scorned night immunity however. - IF the scorned has already won, they will 'be at peace' and no longer convertible.
Any comments?

item.title: Moley's 'Convert the Neut's' Idea
item.dc:creator: Vandalay
item.description:
Eran_Shmuel:

BD much stronger now, i don’t know the stats but i don’t think that those changes are the right answer.

Well do we have a direction to go in, at least for me, I feel most of my losses as unseen/cult, are coming from 3/4ths of my conversion attempts failing. As a MM I pretty much have to go with failed sheriff. Princess wills are mostly off the table these days due to not actually getting to use my investigations as 3/4ths of nights I’m desperately attempting to convert anything.

Failed sheriff imitation, because 90% of the time unseen is only at 2 members, which makes busing almost inviable because at least for me lately 2/3rds of conversion attempts fail.

You wait for someone to come out as investigative, well yeah that works, except that usually means you just lost a member, and that also red flags him for the CW.
